<title level="1" pfs="">[Edolpho Phinelli](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1161)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Edolpho Phinelli, the notorious con artist, has developed a new scheme. He's selling an elixir that he claims can heal wounds, erase scars, and regrow hair. The citizens that live in the red light district are buying it by the case-full. Edolpho is looking to get rich quick! Fast enough to hop on a ship out of the city with enough earnings to set himself up in a new town.

<column gap="tiny">

([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 28

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 26

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 23
</column>

</column>

</column>

He can also use an acting Performance instead of [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) to [Impersonate](/Actions.aspx?ID=46).

[Illusory Disguise](/Spells.aspx?ID=159), [Magic Aura](/Spells.aspx?ID=178), [Unseen Servant](/Spells.aspx?ID=352), [Ventriloquism](/Spells.aspx?ID=356) (3 slots)
